policy_non_nuclear_waste: Near-surface disposal of VLLW and LLW at El Cabril.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier or managed by ENRESA through storage and disposal routes.
policy_nfc_waste: VLLW/LLW to El Cabril; higher-activity waste and SF to centralized storage then DGR.
policy_spent_fuel: Interim storage for around 60 years before geological disposal.
wmo_responsibilities: All RW and SF management and decommissioning of nuclear facilities.
funding_rwm: Producers pay contributions through electricity tariffs and specific fees.
funding_sf_hlw: Same national fund; contributions from nuclear operators.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed from the same fund.
reactors_note: Fleet of PWR and BWR units in operation; one reactor under decommissioning.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW disposed at the national LLWR and Dounreay; VLLW may go to conventional landfills.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier or managed through national waste routes.
policy_nfc_waste: Higher activity waste to be disposed in a geological disposal facility; LLW via near-surface facilities.
policy_spent_fuel: SF from AGR and PWR reactors expected to be disposed in a geological disposal facility after storage.
wmo_responsibilities: Strategic management of historic and public sector RW and SF liabilities.
funding_rwm: Government funding for NDA estate; producers pay for non-NDA sites.
funding_sf_hlw: Combination of government funding and contributions from operators.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funds for commercial reactors; government for legacy sites.
reactors_note: AGR fleet plus one PWR; two EPR units under construction at Hinkley Point C.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Institutional waste and LLW disposed in near-surface facilities where appropriate.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier if feasible, otherwise storage and disposal in national facilities.
policy_nfc_waste: Existing LLW repository and planned facilities for long-lived ILW and geological disposal.
policy_spent_fuel: Direct disposal of spent fuel in a deep geological repository at Forsmark (KBS-3).
wmo_responsibilities: Development and operation of SF and RW storage and disposal facilities.
funding_rwm: Nuclear Waste Fund financed by fees on nuclear electricity generation.
funding_sf_hlw: Same Nuclear Waste Fund for SF/HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning costs covered via the same fund.
reactors_note: Six reactors in operation at Forsmark, Oskarshamn and Ringhals.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Near-surface storage/disposal for institutional radioactive waste.
policy_disused_sources: Return to supplier where possible, otherwise centralized storage and conditioning.
policy_nfc_waste: Centralized storage at NPP site and future disposal facility.
policy_spent_fuel: Long-term storage of spent fuel at Akkuyu NPP site; geological disposal option under development.
wmo_responsibilities: National coordination of radioactive waste management and disposal projects.
funding_rwm: Producers pay contributions to a radioactive waste management account.
funding_sf_hlw: Fees on nuclear electricity to a spent fuel and HLW fund.
funding_decom: Separate decommissioning fund financed by operators.
reactors_note: Four VVER-1200 units under construction at Akkuyu NPP.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW disposed in regional near-surface facilities; ILW disposal routes vary by state/compact.
policy_disused_sources: Return to manufacturer where possible; otherwise storage, reuse, recycle or disposal.
policy_nfc_waste: LLW via near-surface disposal; HLW intended for disposal in a geological repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Wet and dry storage at reactor sites and ISFSIs with long-term geological disposal as policy.
wmo_responsibilities: Management of DOE-owned RW and SF and development of federal disposal solutions; LLW for commercial waste via state/compact system.
wmo_ownership: State / federal agencies and state compacts
funding_rwm: Producers and government funding depending on waste origin.
funding_sf_hlw: Nuclear Waste Fund financed by fees on nuclear electricity (collections suspended).
funding_decom: Decommissioning trust funds regulated by NRC; public sector sites funded by the federal budget.
reactors_note: Large LWR fleet with many units permanently shut down and in various stages of decommissioning.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Low- and intermediate-level waste disposed in underground rock caverns at Olkiluoto and Loviisa sites.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by national waste facilities.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste to VLJ and Loviisa repositories; long-lived ILW and HLW to deep geological repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at plant-specific interim facilities before final disposal in the Onkalo repository.
wmo_responsibilities: Posiva responsible for spent fuel disposal; utilities responsible for operational waste management.
funding_rwm: Nuclear Waste Fund financed by levies on nuclear electricity and producers.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed through the Nuclear Waste Fund.
reactors_note: Five reactors in operation (Loviisa 1–2, Olkiluoto 1–3); one EPR commenced commercial operation in 2023.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Very low-level waste disposed at Cires; low- and intermediate-level short-lived waste at CSA repository.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sealed sources returned to supplier or managed by Andra.
policy_nfc_waste: VLLW/LLW to surface repositories; long-lived ILW and vitrified HLW stored at La Hague pending deep geological disposal (CIGEO).
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel largely reprocessed at La Hague; remaining waste stored before geological disposal.
wmo_responsibilities: Planning, construction and operation of radioactive waste disposal facilities in France.
funding_rwm: Financed by generators via contributions and dedicated provisions.
funding_sf_hlw: Same national funds and contracts with EDF/Orano for HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning and waste management financed by operators under state oversight.
reactors_note: Large PWR fleet; one EPR under construction; several older units in decommissioning.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Conditioned LLW/ILW to be disposed in the Konrad mine; near-surface storage at nuclear sites.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources managed by state collection points or returned to supplier.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste to central interim storage; long-lived waste and spent fuel to future geological repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored in dry casks at reactor sites; final disposal to a deep geological repository (site selection ongoing).
wmo_responsibilities: Development and operation of radioactive waste repositories (Konrad, future HLW repository).
funding_rwm: Funded by waste producers (utilities) and a state-administered fund created with utility contributions.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund covers spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by operators; oversight by state agencies.
reactors_note: All power reactors shut down in 2023 as part of the nuclear phase-out; several reactors in decommissioning.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW are processed and disposed in engineered near-surface facilities; some waste injected into deep boreholes.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sealed sources returned to supplier or managed by licensed facilities.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste reprocessed or conditioned and stored; HLW vitrified and stored pending final disposal.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel reprocessed at Mayak; some stored for possible recycling; deep geological repository planned at Krasnoyarsk.
wmo_responsibilities: Management and disposal of radioactive waste in Russia, including repository development.
funding_rwm: Financed by waste generators through levies; state funding for legacy waste.
funding_sf_hlw: Same mechanisms for spent fuel and HLW, with contributions from nuclear operators.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by state and operators via dedicated funds.
reactors_note: Large fleet of VVER, RBMK and fast reactors in operation; several reactors under construction and older units being decommissioned.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Low- and intermediate-level waste disposed in regional engineered surface repositories (Northwest, Southwest sites).
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources collected and managed by provincial waste agencies or returned to supplier.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and disposed; HLW vitrified and stored; deep geological repository planned near Beishan.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at reactor sites and at centralized interim facilities; long-term plan for reprocessing and geological disposal.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for nuclear fuel cycle including waste treatment and disposal; CNNC Nuclear Environment Company for waste.
funding_rwm: Financed by state and contributions from nuclear operators via waste disposal fees.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding mechanisms for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning costs covered by operators with state oversight.
reactors_note: Rapidly expanding fleet dominated by PWRs; numerous units under construction at coastal sites.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Low- and intermediate-level waste is processed and stored at each site; some near-surface disposal.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by the Atomic Energy Regulatory Board.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; vitrified HLW stored at Tarapur; deep geological repository under study.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel is reprocessed (PHWRs) or stored; long-term disposal being planned.
wmo_responsibilities: BARC handles fuel cycle and waste management R&D; NPCIL manages operational waste from NPPs.
funding_rwm: Financed through electricity tariffs and government funding.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding sources for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning costs covered by state and operators via provisions.
reactors_note: A mix of PHWRs and two VVER units; several PHWR units under construction.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Very low-level waste to disposal at Rokkasho; LLW to engineered trenches and future repository.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to manufacturer or managed by JAEA facilities.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and disposed; vitrified HLW stored at Rokkasho awaiting geological disposal.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at plant pools and at Mutsu; long-term plan for direct disposal in a geological repository.
wmo_responsibilities: NUMO responsible for siting and construction of geological repository; JNFL for LLW disposal and reprocessing.
wmo_ownership: Jointly owned by utilities and state
funding_rwm: Financed by waste generators via fees; reprocessing and disposal funds managed by the Radioactive Waste Management Fund.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund supports HLW management and geological disposal.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed through decommissioning funds collected from operators.
reactors_note: Post-Fukushima restart of selected BWR and PWR units; many reactors in long-term shutdown or decommissioning.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Low- and intermediate-level waste to near-surface disposal at Chalk River and licensed sites.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to manufacturer or managed by CNL.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; LLW and ILW disposal facilities planned; HLW stored until repository available.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at reactor sites in pools and dry storage; long-term deep geological repository being sited by NWMO.
wmo_responsibilities: NWMO manages planning for deep geological disposal of spent fuel; CNL manages low- and intermediate-level waste and legacy sites.
wmo_ownership: Non-profit (NWMO) owned by nuclear utilities; CNL is a federal contractor
funding_rwm: Financed by nuclear operators via the Nuclear Fuel Waste Act funds and government for legacy waste.
funding_sf_hlw: Spent fuel management financed by trust funds contributed by operators.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by operators through trust funds and by government for federally owned facilities.
reactors_note: Major CANDU fleet in Ontario; some units permanently shut down and decommissioned.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Low-level and very low-level waste disposed in surface repository at Dessel (cAt project).
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or collected and stored by ONDRAF/NIRAS.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored at Belgoprocess; long-lived ILW and HLW stored awaiting deep repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored in pools at reactor sites; decision on reprocessing vs direct disposal pending.
wmo_responsibilities: Management of all radioactive waste in Belgium, including disposal facility development.
funding_rwm: Financed by waste producers via levies and a national waste fund.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed through provisions by operators and national fund.
reactors_note: PWR fleet at Doel and Tihange; phase-out policy under debate.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: All radioactive waste stored at COVRA; no disposal facility yet.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or collected by COVRA.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored at COVRA; disposal policy under development.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel from Borssele returned to France after reprocessing; HLW stored at COVRA pending geological disposal.
wmo_responsibilities: Central organization for the management, treatment and storage of all radioactive waste in the Netherlands.
funding_rwm: Financed by waste producers via fees.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fee structure funds management of spent fuel and HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by operators through dedicated funds.
reactors_note: One PWR at Borssele in operation; lifetime extended.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Short-lived LLW/ILW disposed in the Würenlingen repository at ZWILAG; VLLW recycled where possible.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by PSI/ZWILAG.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; deep geological repository planned for HLW and long-lived ILW.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored in pools and at ZWILAG interim facility; direct disposal planned in Nördlich Lägern repository.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for siting, construction and operation of deep geological repository and long-term management of HLW/ILW.
wmo_ownership: Co-operative owned by nuclear utilities and federal government
funding_rwm: Financed by nuclear utilities through dedicated funds; government contributes for research and oversight.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding arrangements for HLW and spent fuel management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by operators through funds supervised by federal authority.
reactors_note: Four reactors (Beznau 1-2, Gösgen, Leibstadt); Mühleberg shut down in 2019.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Low- and intermediate-level waste disposed at Vaalputs repository.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by NRWDI.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and disposed at Vaalputs; HLW stored at Koeberg pending repository development.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at Koeberg in pools and dry casks; long-term plan for geological disposal.
wmo_responsibilities: Development and operation of radioactive waste disposal facilities in South Africa.
funding_rwm: Financed by levies on nuclear electricity and government funding.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding framework for spent fuel and HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funded by provisions by Eskom and government oversight.
reactors_note: Two PWR units at Koeberg; plans for new build deferred.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Low- and intermediate-level waste stored and partially disposed at the Ezeiza facility.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sealed sources returned to supplier or managed by CNEA.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored at Ezeiza; LLW/ILW to near-surface repositories under development.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at each plant; some dry storage at Embalse; long-term plan for geological disposal or return to supplier.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for radioactive waste management and decommissioning activities in Argentina.
funding_rwm: Financed by levies on nuclear electricity and government budget.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund covers spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed via CNEA funds and operator contributions.
reactors_note: Three reactors in operation (Atucha 1–2, Embalse); one SMR under construction.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW stored on-site at the Armenian NPP; no disposal facility yet.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by national authority.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored at plant; disposal policy under development.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored in pools; Russia responsible for taking back fuel for reprocessing under fuel supply contracts.
wmo_responsibilities: Regulator oversees waste management; plant operator manages waste and storage.
funding_rwm: Costs recovered through electricity tariffs and state support.
funding_sf_hlw: Spent fuel management funded through contracts with fuel supplier (Russia).
funding_decom: Decommissioning funding mechanism under development.
reactors_note: One VVER-440 unit at Metsamor; life extension approved.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW stored on-site; future near-surface disposal planned.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or stored by national waste management organization.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored at plant site; final disposal facility planned.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel returned to Russia under fuel supply contract; no national disposal foreseen.
wmo_responsibilities: Regulator oversees waste management; plant operator responsible for waste handling.
funding_rwm: Financed through electricity tariffs and agreements with Russian fuel supplier.
funding_sf_hlw: Same arrangement covers spent fuel returned to Russia.
funding_decom: Decommissioning costs to be funded by future provisions.
reactors_note: Belarusian NPP with one unit operating and one under construction.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW from research facilities stored at AERE Savar; disposal site to be developed.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or stored by BAERA.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste from Rooppur NPP to be managed by plant operator; policies under development.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel from Rooppur to be returned to Russia for reprocessing under intergovernmental agreement.
wmo_responsibilities: Manages nuclear research and will oversee waste management for Rooppur NPP.
funding_rwm: Financed by state budget and provisions from nuclear project.
funding_sf_hlw: Spent fuel and HLW funding through contract with Russian supplier.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financing framework to be established.
reactors_note: Two VVER-1200 units under construction at Rooppur; no reactors operating yet.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW disposed at near-surface repository (Abadia de Goiás); more facilities planned.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by CNEN.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; national repository (RBMN) for LLW/ILW planned in Caetité.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at Angra site; long-term plan for deep geological disposal by 2050.
wmo_responsibilities: Regulates and manages radioactive waste; Eletronuclear responsible for waste from power plants.
funding_rwm: Financed by electricity tariffs and government funding.
funding_sf_hlw: Same scheme funds spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funded through provisions by Eletronuclear and government support.
reactors_note: Two PWR units at Angra in operation; Angra 3 construction resumed intermittently.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW disposed in near-surface repository at Dukovany.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by SURAO.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and disposed; long-lived ILW and HLW to be disposed in deep geological repository by 2065.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored in interim dry casks at Dukovany and Temelín; final disposal in planned repository.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for safe disposal of all radioactive waste and for developing a deep geological repository.
funding_rwm: Financed by levies on nuclear electricity and contributions from waste producers.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by operators through provisions.
reactors_note: Six PWR units in operation; plans for a new unit at Dukovany.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW disposed in National Radioactive Waste Repository at Mochovce.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by JAVYS.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and disposed; long-lived ILW and HLW to be disposed in deep geological repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at Bohunice and Mochovce interim storage facilities; final disposal planned in geological repository.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for decommissioning and waste management, including disposal facility operation.
funding_rwm: Financed by National Nuclear Fund through electricity tariffs.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund supports spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed through National Nuclear Fund.
reactors_note: Four reactors in operation; Mochovce 3–4 nearing completion; Bohunice V1 units in decommissioning.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW planned for disposal at Vrbina repository (under construction).
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by ARAO.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored at Krško; repository planned for operational waste.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at Krško in pools and a dry storage facility; joint disposal solution with Croatia under negotiation.
wmo_responsibilities: Management of radioactive waste and siting of LILW repository.
funding_rwm: Financed by contributions from the Krško NPP owners (Slovenia and Croatia).
funding_sf_hlw: Same contributions and national fund for spent fuel and HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by owners’ decommissioning fund.
reactors_note: Krško PWR operated jointly by Slovenia and Croatia; long-term operation to 2043.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW disposed at Saligny repository near Cernavodă.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or stored at IFIN-HH.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; long-lived ILW and HLW to be disposed in a future deep repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel from Cernavodă stored in dry storage modules on site; final disposal planned in geological repository.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for management and final disposal of radioactive waste in Romania.
funding_rwm: Financed by levies on nuclear electricity and state budget.
funding_sf_hlw: Same financing for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by operator provisions and national fund.
reactors_note: Two CANDU units at Cernavodă in operation; two additional units planned.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW disposed at near-surface repositories in the Chernobyl exclusion zone and at Vektor complex.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by national waste company.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; long-lived ILW and HLW to be disposed in future deep repository.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored on-site at NPPs and at centralized interim storage facility (CISF); eventual geological disposal planned.
wmo_name: State Agency of Ukraine on Exclusion Zone Management & Energoatom
wmo_responsibilities: Management of radioactive waste and spent fuel; development of disposal facilities.
funding_rwm: Financed by electricity tariffs and government funding.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding covers spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed via state budget and contributions from Energoatom.
reactors_note: Four NPP sites with VVER units; construction of two units at Khmelnytskyi resumed; war impacts operations.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW disposed at Maišiagala and Ignalina repositories; new repository under development.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or collected by state enterprise.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste from Ignalina decommissioning conditioned and stored; long-term repository being developed.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel from Ignalina stored in dry storage at the site; direct disposal planned.
wmo_responsibilities: Management of decommissioning waste and development of final disposal solutions.
funding_rwm: Financed by EU funds and national budget.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funded through international and national funds.
reactors_note: Ignalina RBMK reactors shut down (2004/2009) and being decommissioned.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW from research reactors and uranium industry disposed at near-surface facilities.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by National Nuclear Center.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; national repository plans under discussion.
policy_spent_fuel: No commercial reactors; spent fuel from research reactors stored on-site or returned to supplier.
wmo_responsibilities: Manages research reactors and waste management facilities.
funding_rwm: Financed by state budget and industry contributions.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding mechanisms for any future HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by government and operators.
reactors_note: No commercial nuclear reactors; small research reactors at Kurchatov and Alatau.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW from Laguna Verde stored on-site; national repository under consideration.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by ININ.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; HLW policy under development.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored in pools and dry storage at Laguna Verde; future deep repository envisaged.
wmo_responsibilities: CNSNS regulates nuclear safety; CFE manages spent fuel and waste from Laguna Verde.
funding_rwm: Financed by electricity tariffs and government funding.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding for spent fuel and HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed by operator provisions.
reactors_note: Two BWR units at Laguna Verde; no new units under construction.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW managed and stored by PAEC; disposal facility planned.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by PAEC.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; national repository program under study.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored at reactor sites; potential return to supplier for Chinese-designed units.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for all nuclear fuel cycle activities including waste management.
funding_rwm: Financed by government budget and electricity revenues.
funding_sf_hlw: Same financing for spent fuel and HLW.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funding mechanisms under development.
reactors_note: Six reactors in operation (Chashma and Karachi); two Hualong One units under construction.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: No nuclear power; small amounts of LLW/ILW from medical and industrial uses stored at national facility.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or collected by national radiation laboratory.
policy_nfc_waste: Not applicable (no nuclear fuel cycle).
policy_spent_fuel: Not applicable.
wmo_responsibilities: Manages storage and eventual disposal of small amounts of radioactive waste.
funding_rwm: Financed through government budget.
funding_sf_hlw: Not applicable.
funding_decom: Not applicable.
reactors_note: New Zealand has no nuclear power reactors; only small waste from medicine and industry.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Legacy nuclear test waste encapsulated in Runit Dome; no current waste generation.
policy_disused_sources: Not applicable.
policy_nfc_waste: Not applicable.
policy_spent_fuel: Not applicable.
wmo_responsibilities: No national nuclear program; U.S. DOE oversees Runit Dome.
funding_rwm: U.S. government funded.
funding_sf_hlw: Not applicable.
funding_decom: Not applicable.
reactors_note: No nuclear reactors; Runit Dome stores waste from U.S. nuclear tests.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Institutional LLW and ILW stored at national facility in Amman.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or stored at JAEC facilities.
policy_nfc_waste: No nuclear fuel cycle; research reactor waste managed by national program.
policy_spent_fuel: No spent fuel.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for waste management and development of nuclear programme.
funding_rwm: Financed by government budget and international assistance.
funding_sf_hlw: Not applicable.
funding_decom: Not applicable.
reactors_note: Jordan operates a research reactor; no commercial nuclear power program.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW from research reactors processed at Inshas and stored; future repository considered.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by the Egyptian Atomic Energy Authority.
policy_nfc_waste: No commercial nuclear fuel cycle yet; planned El Dabaa NPP will produce waste managed by national system.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel from future El Dabaa plant expected to be stored on-site and possibly returned to supplier.
wmo_responsibilities: EAEA manages research reactor waste; NPPA responsible for waste from El Dabaa NPP.
funding_rwm: Financed by government budget and provisions from NPP operator.
funding_sf_hlw: Same financing for spent fuel and HLW when El Dabaa operates.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funds to be established for El Dabaa.
reactors_note: El Dabaa NPP (four units) under construction; research reactors at Inshas.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW conditioned and stored on-site at Barakah; policy for national repository under development.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by ENEC.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste managed by ENEC and Nawah; disposal in national facility planned.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel stored on-site at Barakah for the lifetime of the plant; long-term disposal solution under study.
wmo_responsibilities: FANR regulates nuclear activities; ENEC/Nawah operate Barakah and manage waste.
funding_rwm: Financed by fees charged to operators and government support.
funding_sf_hlw: Same funding covers future spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funds collected during plant operation.
reactors_note: Four APR1400 units at Barakah; all expected to be in operation by 2024.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW from Bushehr and research reactors stored on-site; disposal facility planned.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by AEOI.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; high-level waste returned to Russia under fuel contract.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel from Bushehr returned to Russia after cooling period.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for all nuclear activities including waste management.
funding_rwm: Financed by state budget and power plant revenues.
funding_sf_hlw: No national HLW management needed due to return-to-supplier contract.
funding_decom: Decommissioning funded by operator and state.
reactors_note: One VVER-1000 unit at Bushehr in operation; additional units under construction.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW from research reactors stored at BATAN facilities; disposal site planned.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by BATAN.
policy_nfc_waste: No commercial nuclear fuel cycle; policies under development for future nuclear program.
policy_spent_fuel: No spent fuel.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for research reactors and radioactive waste management.
funding_rwm: Financed by government budget.
funding_sf_hlw: Not applicable.
funding_decom: Not applicable.
reactors_note: Indonesia operates research reactors but no nuclear power plants.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW from Paks NPP disposed at Bátaapáti repository.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or stored by PURAM.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and disposed; HLW and spent fuel stored on-site awaiting final solution.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel from Paks stored in interim dry storage; decision on reprocessing vs direct disposal pending.
wmo_responsibilities: Responsible for managing and disposing all radioactive waste from Hungary.
funding_rwm: Financed by Nuclear Energy Fund funded by fees on electricity production.
funding_sf_hlw: Same fund for spent fuel and HLW management.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed through the Nuclear Energy Fund.
reactors_note: Four VVER-440 units at Paks; lifetime extension underway; new Paks II project planned.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: LLW and ILW from Kozloduy disposed in near-surface repository at Radiana under construction.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by SERAW.
policy_nfc_waste: Operational waste conditioned and stored; HLW returned to Russia after reprocessing.
policy_spent_fuel: Spent fuel shipped to Russia for reprocessing under fuel supply contract.
wmo_responsibilities: Manages radioactive waste from nuclear power and medicine; builds disposal facilities.
funding_rwm: Financed by Nuclear Facilities Decommissioning Fund paid by electricity consumers.
funding_sf_hlw: Spent fuel management funded by contracts with Russia and national fund.
funding_decom: Decommissioning financed through decommissioning fund.
reactors_note: Two VVER-1000 units at Kozloduy in operation; older units shut down and being decommissioned.

policy_non_nuclear_waste: Institutional radioactive waste stored at ANSTO and state facilities; national disposal facility being developed at Kimba.
policy_disused_sources: Disused sources returned to supplier or managed by ANSTO.
policy_nfc_waste: No commercial nuclear fuel cycle; waste from research reactors and industry stored and planned for disposal at National Radioactive Waste Management Facility.
policy_spent_fuel: No spent fuel (research reactor fuel returned to supplier).
wmo_responsibilities: Develops and will operate national radioactive waste facility; ANSTO manages existing waste.
funding_rwm: Funded by government and waste producers through service fees.
funding_sf_hlw: Not applicable (no SF/HLW).
funding_decom: Decommissioning funded by government.
reactors_note: No nuclear power; only research reactor (OPAL) producing low-level waste.
